actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the unauthorized disclosure of checks, drafts, or similar instruments by financial institutions, unless required by court order, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, the unauthorized disclosure of checks, drafts, or similar instruments by financial institutions, unless required by court order. Provides criminal penalties for any such unauthorized disclosure of up to $l,000 in fines or one year imprisonment or both.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the unauthorized disclosure of checks, drafts, or similar instruments by financial institutions, unless required by court order, and for other purposes.
